Monday in Carelia: explosion in garages and fire at dormitories
In Petrozavodsk, a man was killed in a garage explosion, a dormitory in the metropolitan area was burning, and the inhabitants of the Republic explained why heating was more expensive than they said on this Monday.

The Moon Cycle can provide guidance for important decisions, ambushing and changing images. When it's best to do it in February, it's in our stuff.
Yesterday, 18:15.
In the next hours, the air in Carelia will be cold to -32 degrees
This cold is expected in the region in the next three days: this has been reported on the RC Hydromet Centre website.
Yesterday, 6:00.
Experts told me what cars could be bought in 2024.
The automobile market in Russia has changed considerably. We'll tell you what cars can be purchased without a problem.

Gripp and RWI continue to rage in the republics, and this has been reported in the RSU.

We met the stats, looked at the spots on the popular sites, and we found out which professionals in Carelia are willing to pay the most. More detailed, in our material.

Petrozavodska's latest news today

The lung driver hit the child at speed in Petrozavodsk and closed.
Witnesses were assisted by the piling child: the time of the accident was hit by the camera. How
Today, 04:24
A young man with a scar on his forehead disappeared in Carelia.
The man came out of the house and disappeared: this was reported in the DROSPAS search party.
Today, 03:40
Anomalous freezes will be delayed in Carelia.
Morosis was not expected throughout the territory of the RC and was reported at the Hydrometh Centre.
Yesterday, 13:54
The Public Support Centre conducts lectures in the Kareliyah areas
This enables citizens to understand the importance of electoral participation in order to maintain the country ' s development results.
Yesterday, 13:34
There was a dormitory in Petrozavodsk: 25 people were saved.
Most of the towns had to evacuate from the building in the gas masks: details had been given to the CD Ministry Press Service.
Yesterday, 13:28
The explosions will heat up in the Kareliyah area
Loud sounds may intimidate the inhabitants of the nearest towns: they were warned by the district administration press.
Yesterday, 13:10
